title: Regime Detection Hierarchy
purpose: Label market regime (calm/trend/choppy) to gate or tilt downstream sets.
rationale: Use VIX level and IV rank for volatility context and daily momentum for directional bias.

reading_guide.signal_logic: if VIX < 18 and momentum>0 => calm/trending; if VIX>25 => volatile

beginner_summary: Daily label for market regime (calm/trending vs volatile) to guide risk.
assistant_hints: Use regime as a gate/tilt, not a direct entry signal.
Update once daily to avoid noisy intraday flips.
Combine VIX level with price momentum for context.
Tighten risk and reduce size in volatile regimes.
